author: IGN
description: Don't miss the Nightmares And Visions Launch Trailer for Warhammer 40,000: Darktide, an action-adventure first-person shooter developed by Fatshark. Players will be able to interact with a new wave-based mode called the 'Mortis Trials' calling upon players to fight back against dangerous enemies round after round. The update is also fitted with a refresh of Havoc mode, an overhaul of the Ogryn talent tree, a new time-limited live event, and more for players to enjoy. The Nightmares And Visions Update for Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is available now for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC.
title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide - Official Nightmares And Visions Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
Assassin's Creed Shadows has been a hit with critics and with fans, boasting huge first- and second-day player concurrents in the millions. However, Ubisoft has not released sales figures (yet), and cautions that Shadows' sales performance shouldn't be compared to the last mainline AC game, Valhalla, which was released at the beginning of the COVID-19 pandemic when everyone was staying home and playing games anyway. Shadows instead should be compared to Assassin's Creed Odyssey, Origins, and Mirage, which was the most recent release before Shadows. In other news, two major games just received big updates—Monster Hunter Wilds is getting its first big patch, and Civilization 7 has a new update that addresses much-needed quality-of-life issues.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows' Sales Shouldn't Be Compared to Valhalla - IGN Daily Fix

author: IGN
description: Meet Margielyn Didal in this behind-the-scenes video for Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4. Learn more about this new skater joining the roster of new Pros in the upcoming sports game. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 returns, but revamped with more skaters, new parks, gnarlier tricks, music, and more. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 will be available on Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Nintendo Switch, Battle.net, and PC (Steam) on July 11, 2025.
title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 - Official Margielyn Didal Trailer

title: Jack Quaid gushes about the Nemesis system while playing Shadow of Mordor! #ignarcade #jackquaid

author: IGN
title: Young Mazino (Jesse in HBO's The Last of Us) says his League of Legends addiction was so BAD. #ign

author: IGN
description: Check out the Release Date Announcement Trailer for Soulslinger: Envoy of Death, an action-adventure Western first-person roguelike shooter developed by Elder Games. Players will fight through the afterlife to craft deadly weapons, attain power-ups, and endure the underworld of Limbo to reach salvation. The story is packed with endearing allies and formidable foes with the narrative shifting depending on the actions of the player through the roguelike design. Soulslinger: Envoy of Death is launching on April 17 for PC (Steam).
title: Soulslinger: Envoy of Death - Official Release Date Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description: Watch the Spring to Life Launch Trailer for Minecraft, the creative adventure game developed by Mojang. Players can now access the Spring to Life update for the game fitted with a Spring-themed overhaul to the game including fresh winds for each biome, new mob variants, sounds, and more to ring in the new season. The Spring to Life update is available now for Minecraft.
title: Minecraft - Official Spring to Life Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Alive Trailer for Daredevil: Born Again, the latest action series installment in the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Disney and Marvel Studios. 

Take a look at the latest trailer as tensions rise with Matt Murdock coming to terms with the city of Hell's Kitchen needing Daredevil after a year hiatus and chaos bubbling under the surface.

Catch two new episodes of Daredevil: Born Again on Disney Plus at 6 pm PT/ 9 pm ET tonight.
title: Daredevil: Born Again - Official Alive Trailer (2025) Charlie Cox, Vincent D'Onofrio

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Wildgate in this reveal trailer for the upcoming crew-based first-person shooter set in the far reaches of space. The Wildgate reveal trailer shows action-packed gameplay, spaceship combat, and more. Wildgate will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S in 2025. A preview playtest takes place from April 10-14, 2025, and sign-ups to join are available now.

In Wildgate, players (called “Prospectors”) team up in small crews to venture into a hostile, unpredictable, and mysterious region of space in search of an ancient relic known as the Artifact. While in pursuit of the Artifact, players work together to pilot their spacecraft, plunder wreckage, and discover forgotten loot. To win, crews must successfully reach the exit point with the Artifact or go for a domination victory by destroying all rival ships by whatever means necessary.

#Wildgate #Gaming #Games
title: Wildgate - Official Announcement Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a deep dive into the gameplay and world of Wildgate in this trailer for the upcoming crew-based first-person shooter set in the far reaches of space. Learn about your objective, choosing your ship, outfitting and managing your crew, the dangers you'll encounter, and more. Wildgate will be available on Steam, PS5 (PlayStation 5), and Xbox Series X|S in 2025. A preview playtest takes place from April 10-14, 2025, and sign-ups to join are available now.

In Wildgate, players (called “Prospectors”) team up in small crews to venture into a hostile, unpredictable, and mysterious region of space in search of an ancient relic known as the Artifact. While in pursuit of the Artifact, players work together to pilot their spacecraft, plunder wreckage, and discover forgotten loot. To win, crews must successfully reach the exit point with the Artifact or go for a domination victory by destroying all rival ships by whatever means necessary.

#Wildgate #Gaming #Games
title: Wildgate - Official Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description: Wildgate is a chaotic sci-fi first-person shooter from former Blizzard boss Mike Morhaime's new studio, Dreamhave. It blends PvE and PvP objectives alongside exploration and combat on foot and aboard a ship that requires multiple people to operate – a formula that may feel quite familiar to any fellow Sea of Thieves fans. But unlike Sea of Thieves, where the chaos of player-on-player piracy is a somewhat infrequent and optional distraction, in Wildgate it’s the primary focus, and the inevitable clash of geared-up crews left us feeling the same heart-pounding intensity of a battle royale. Previewed by Travis Northup
title: Wildgate: The First Hands-On Preview

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at this LEGO mini-movie based on the critically acclaimed fantasy novel and film series The Lord of the Rings to introduce an upcoming LEGO set for fans to enjoy. The Lord of the Rings LEGO mini-movie is packed with a tribute to the cinematic artistry of the trilogy accompanied by a rendition of the iconic Osgiliath monologue. The upcoming LEGO Lord of the Rings set is a recreation of the iconic set of The Shrine packed with Bilbo's hobbit-hole, Gandalf’s horse and cart, and the legendary round green door with a richly appointed interior. The over 2,000-piece LEGO Lord of the Rings set of The Shrine is launching on April 2nd for LEGO insiders and April 5th for everyone else.

Credit: The LEGO Group

#LordOfTheRings #LEGO #IGN
title: LEGO Lord of the Rings - Official Mini Movie (feat. Sean Astin)

author: IGN
description:
Join Executive Vice President of World of Darkness Marco Behrmann for a development update on Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2, including what has been added and the reveal the RPG will now release in October 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Vampire: the Masquerade - Bloodlines 2 - Official Game Update Video

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the new Drop trailer for the drama thriller distributed by Universal Pictures.

A widowed mother on her first date in years, who arrives at an upscale restaurant where she is relieved that her date, Henry is more charming and handsome than she expected. But their chemistry begins to curdle as Violet begins being irritated and then terrorized by a series of anonymous drops to her phone.

Drop stars Meghann Fahy, Brandon Sklenar, Violett Beane, Jacob Robinson, Reed Diamond, Gabrielle Ryan, and more. The film is directed by Christopher Landon alongside Jillian Jacobs and Chris Roach as writers for Drop.

Drop will be released in theaters on April 11.

#Movies #Trailer #Drop
title: Drop - Official Trailer 2 (2025) Meghann Fahy, Brandon Sklenar

author: IGN
title: The Shire LEGO set from The Lord of the Rings has been revealed! #lego #lotr #lordoftherings #movie

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Final Destination Bloodlines trailer for the new Final Destination slasher horror film distributed by Warner Bros. Pictures. 

This latest chapter of the franchise is set to take viewers back to the very beginning. Plagued by a violent recurring nightmare, college student Stefanie heads home to track down the one person who might be able to break the cycle and save her family from the grisly demise that inevitably awaits them all.

Final Destination Bloodlines stars Kaitlyn Santa Juana, Teo Briones, Richard Harmon, Owen Patrick Joyner, Anna Lore, with Brec Bassinger, and the late and great Tony Todd. The film is directed by Adam Stein & Zach Lipovsky alongside being written by Guy Busick, Lori Evans Taylor, and Jon Watts.

Final Destination Bloodlines will be released in theaters and IMAX on May 16, 2025.

#FinalDestination #Movies #Trailer
title: Final Destination Bloodlines - Official Trailer (2025) Tony Todd, Kaitlyn Santa Juana, Teo Briones

author: IGN
description:
Enjoy the brand-new cinematic trailer for Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon, the upcoming open-world first-person RPG based on the hugely popular board game that's coming to PC, PS5, and Xbox in Q2 2025. A playable demo is now available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1466060/Tainted_Grail_The_Fall_of_Avalon/ 

Cinematic created by Unity Image in cooperation with Awaken Realms. 
Music credits: Ymir by Danheim & Gealdyr

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon – Official Cinematic Trailer (2025)

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the world, some characters you'll meet, and gameplay from Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon in this new trailer for the upcoming open-world first-person RPG. Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and PC (Steam and GOG) in Q2 2025. A demo is out now. Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon's final patch 0.9 is out now on Steam Early Access.

Song credits: Dziva - Ascension

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tainted Grail: Fall of Avalon - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss our Assassin's Creed Shadows graphics comparison featuring AC Shadows PS5 Pro gameplay vs. PS5 gameplay. Here's a quick look at the differences between the PlayStation 5 and PlayStation 5 Pro versions of Assassin's Creed Shadows gameplay. While some parts of the game only have minor changes such as lighting and shadows, other areas in the open world have noticable differences in frame rate and texture quality. This AC Shadows gameplay was captured with the Quality and Performance settings turned on.

#AssassinsCreed #AssassinsCreedShadows #Gaming
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows PS5 Pro vs PS5 Graphics Comparison

author: IGN
description:
Watch the latest Monster Hunter Wilds trailer to see what's coming with the Free Title Update 1, including Mizutsune, Zoh Shia hunt & gear, The Grand Hub, Arch-Tempered Rey Dau, and the Festival of Accord: Blossomdance. The Free Title Update 1 for Monster Hunter Wilds will be released on April 4, 2025. The trailer also teases the return of a monster as part of the Free Title Update 2, which will arrive in summer 2025.

#MonsterHunterWilds #MonsterHunter #Gaming
title: Monster Hunter Wilds - Official Free Title Update 1 Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 50v50 LTM for Fortnite OG Season 3 Trailer for Fortnite, the hit battle royale third-person shooter developed by Epic Games. Players can soon return to the 50v50 LTM for Fortnite OG putting 50-player teams head to head with the last team standing taking the win. 50v50 LTM will be available on April 14 as part of Fortnite OG Season 3.

#Fortnite #Gaming #Games
title: Fortnite OG Season 3 - Official 50v50 LTM Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Join creative director Ed Beach from Firaxis Games for a deep dive into the March 2025 Civilization 7 update, launching on March 25. The new Civ 7 update features settlement and commander renaming, quick move functionality, Mount Everest as a new natural wonder, and more. Here's a look at what to expect.

Sid Meier's Civilization VII is available now for PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Xbox Series X/S, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch, and PC via Steam (which also supports Mac and Linux) and the Epic Games Store.

#Civ7 #Civilization7 #Gaming
title: Civilization 7 - Official March 2025 Developer Update

author: IGN
description:
In our final hands-on with Steel Hunters ahead of its April 2 Early Access launch, we found that its inconsistent pace felt at odds with the relatively quick match times, but overall, Wargaming's extraction mech shooter to be an enjoyable time. Previewed by Charlie Wacholz

#IGN #Gaming
title: Steel Hunters Plays Great…Most of the Time

author: IGN
description:
Check out this Naraka: Bladepoint x Sanrio Characters collaboration trailer for the upcoming Too Cute to Counter crossover event which brings the world of Sanrio to the melee battle royale game. The Sanrio: Too Cute to Counter crossover features the ability for players to buy outfits based on Hello Kitty, My Melody, Kuromi, and Cinnamoroll. The crossover will also include colorful themed UI elements, as well as a themed social lobby with a cute fairground design. Naraka: Bladepoint × Sanrio Characters: Too Cute to Counter crossover content is available from April 1, 2025.

#NarakaBladepoint #Gaming #HelloKitty
title: Naraka: Bladepoint x Sanrio Characters: Too Cute To Counter - Exclusive Crossover Trailer
